name: Rhythm Curse
description:
You seem to have found a peculiar place, a place where the walls move,  but they seem to be moving to music? Can you escape? 

Controls


keyboardJoyPad(xbox)
MovementArrow Keys
D-PadJumpSpaceA ButtonWall Grab
Left Shift
R2

Hey all, Decided to join the 2020 GMTK Game Jam which theme was Out of Control.

First time I did a game jam and whew it's a lot harder than I thought it would be.

Tileset used: https://aamatniekss.itch.io/lava-caves-tileset

music by me
